pkgmetadata.longdescription: Use 'nlmixr2' to Interact with Open Source and Commercial Software // Run other estimation and simulation software via the 'nlmixr2' (Fidler et al (2019) doi:10.1002/psp4.12445) interface including 'PKNCA', 'NONMEM' and 'Monolix'. While not required, you can get/install the 'lixoftConnectors' package in the 'Monolix' installation, as described at the following url https://monolixsuite.slp- software.com/r-functions/2024R1/installation-and- initialization. When 'lixoftConnectors' is available, 'Monolix' can be run directly instead of setting up command line usage.
